content.full_text: Abraham Lincoln to William L. Marcy, 27 May 18481 Enc. a letter from A G. Henderson giving informn of a deserter fromNavy.2
paragraphs: Abraham Lincoln to William L. Marcy, 27 May 18481 Enc. a letter from A G. Henderson giving informn of a deserter fromNavy.2

footnotes.text:
1This register entry, written by a clerk in theWar Department, records the existence of a letter from Abraham Lincoln to Secretary of WarWilliam L. Marcy, written from theHouse of Representativeschamber on May 27, 1848, and enclosing a letter giving information on a deserter
                  from the U.S. Navy.
2A. G. Henderson could not be positively identified.

structured_content.text: Abraham Lincoln to William L. Marcy, 27 May 18481
Enc.[Encloses] a letter from A G. Henderson giving informn[information] of a deserter fromNavy.2
